title: LiveGrid
extract: Off-the-grid is a system and lifestyle designed to help people function without the support of remote infrastructure, such as an electrical grid. ... The term off-the-grid (OTG) can refer to living in a self-sufficient manner without reliance on one or more public utilities. Namely the electrical grid.
extract_html: Off-the-grid is a system and lifestyle designed to help people function without the support of remote infrastructure, such as an electrical grid. ... The term off-the-grid (OTG) can refer to living in a self-sufficient manner without reliance on one or more public utilities. Namely the electrical grid.
